thread.title: NY girl, 12, is shot in head by bullet fired through window into living room
thread.title_full: NY girl, 12, is shot in head by bullet fired through window into living room | OregonLive.com

author: Associated Press
title: NY girl, 12, is shot in head by bullet fired through window into living room
text:
HEMPSTEAD, N.Y. â€” A 12-year-old girl was shot in the head Friday while in the living room of her family's home on Long Island.
Investigators believe someone on the street in front of the two-story home opened fire around 5 p.m. while the girl was standing in the Hemptead home,
Nassau County police said.
A single bullet went through a plate-glass window and struck the girl in the head.
The girl, whose name was not released, remains hospitalized, Det. Sgt. James Skopek said. He said her condition is "grave."
Skopek told reporters that detectives are pursuing multiple leads. He said it was too early in the investigation to know if the girl was targeted.
Neighbors told WPIX-TV that several young men were shooting at each other nearby around the time the girl was struck.
The girl's parents were also inside the home, but were not injured.
Police are continuing to investigate. No arrests have been made.
